text: Horrible experience at this pizza Hut! It is in a hotel and Casino, the lines are long and the workers are completely rude! They run out of things quickly, and when asked a question they respond with rude sarcasm! Very unhappy!

We are staying at the Westgate resort and had walked by this small Pizza Hut a few times on the way to the elevator. It's just inside the north tower doors on the 1st floor. There is ample seating available if you want to eat there. So, Westgate does a "Go green" deal where you get $10 towards any restaurant/food place in the resort if you forego housekeeping services that day (you get the coupon the next day). We got that coupon which made for a sweet, cheap deal at Pizza Hut. We ordered the chicken Alfredo pasta, meat marinara pasta and 3 breadsticks. Holy cow, they get a star just for the breadsticks. I might have to go back for those. Our total with the $10 coupon applied was only $7 something! We weren't able to finish it all with 2 adults eating and a toddler. 

The service was fairly quick and the employees were friendly. They have personal size pizzas. Not sure if they do bigger ones.

All ways have a good experience there but when I called to place an order today I spoke to a guy named Chris, he was very rude. I asked for the specials and he just gave me an attitude and told me to go online and for that I'm going to be ordering somewhere else now.

Conveniently located in Westgate Resort and Casino,this Pizza Hut is a great express value meal for hotel guest... the are located right in front of north tower entrance of the resort...

The staff are helpful and they prepare fresh pizza upon ordering... so it taste great and warm...
